login.email_sent:
We've sent an email to
~{{email}}~
to verify your email address and activate your account. The link in the email will expire in 24 hours.
login.is_not_verified: This account has been registered but not been verified. Please check your {{fieldName1}}: {{fieldName2}} to verify your account.
login.validate_min: {_field_} must be at least {length} characters long.
login.validate_max: {_field_} must be less than or equal to {length} characters long.
login.validate_confirmed: {_field_} and {target} do not match. Please try again!
login.validate_minYearsOld: You must be older than {length} years old to register account.
